contest-event.event-date: Feb. 6, 1977 D Durham League Contest (Section C) Durham League Contest (Section C) 30 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-c The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) The Shipbuilders Community Centre, Thornley Prizes - 1st £18 and cup, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5. 5 bands competed. Sept. 3, 2013, 8:12 a.m. July 7, 2017, 10:13 p.m. 1 Durham Constabulary Keith MacDonald 2 Bearpark and Esh Colliery William Partington 3 Murton Colliery Band Ken Wheatley 4 Ferryhill Town Barry Holden Unknown Result Blackhall Colliery Harold Strong Withdrawn Cameron Iron Works R.
